name: Survivors of the Mare Vitalis
description:
Survivors of the Mare Vitalis is a Rogue-Lite action game, which you can discover unique planets and it's biomes while thousands of animals and uncategorized life forms coming after to kill you!! Earn Credits while destroy them, upgrade yourself and destroy the Ecosystem of each planet!!

Tips and Tricks

  • Collectible items does not vanishes from map until you die.
  • All of collected items (except skill points) are reset on death, but all upgrades and level progression are preserved.
  • There is no time limit so do not hesitate to push the limits.
